full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GNYIS PA ZA BYED MKHA' 'GRO'I SBYIN SREG LA RGYAS BSDUS NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES DAM TSIG RDO RJE'I SGOM BZLAS DANG, ZA BYED MKHA' 'GRO SBYIN SREG JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL 'DI GNYIS KA'ANG, DAD DANG RNAL 'BYOR ZUNG DU 'BREL BA'I RGYAN 'JING SNGAGS RIM PA GRAGS PA 'OD ZER GYIS RANG GIS NYAMS LEN DANG, ,GSHIN RE GNYIS LA'ANG PHAN 'DOD KYI 'DUN PAS BSKUL BA LTAR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BSHAD SGRUB MING CAN GYIS DAM PA'I GSUNG RGYUN LTAR BRIS SO, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
